text: "As Tears Go By" is a 1964 song by English singer Marianne Faithfull. The song peaked at number 9 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. In 1965, the Rolling Stones released their own version which was at the top of the charts in Canada. ==References== Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:1964 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Marianne Faithfull songs Category:Nancy Sinatra songs Category:Pat Boone songs Category:Baroque pop songs
title: As Tears Go By (song)
